channel.notFound: Can't find the channel you're looking for. Check the logged in user and try again.

upload.title: Upload file
upload.hint: You can also double-click the ğŸ”¼

attach.title: Attach image
attach.hint: Try pasting an image into the textbox

action.title: Run action
action.hint: Alternatively, type a / in the input

leave.confirm: Are you sure you want to leave? Unless someone removes you, you'll still be able to rejoin using the invites screen.

passphrase.label: Join by passphrase
passphrase.hint: To join a hidden channel without an invite, ask the owner for the channel number and its passphrase.

channel.locked: This channel is locked. Members cannot edit channel details or add or remove others.

aboutDialog.title: About Conversation
aboutDialog.copyright: Â©2020-2023 Conversation contributors. All rights reserved.

general.error: Something went wrong. Try again later.

header.title: Converse.
header.subtitle: Easily communicate about essential academic projects.

simple.description: Anytime, anywhere. Even on a school chromebook. Conversation utilizes Google Scripts for uncensorable communication.

safe.description: Built to be moderated, from the ground up. State-of-the-art automated filtering combined with real humans can catch everything.

beautiful.description: Wonderfully designed using Google's latest styles. Pretty pretty, if you know what I mean.

powerful.title: Powerful
powerful.description: Easily invite members and chat using not just text but images, bots, and more.

landing.footer: Designed by Zachary in 2023. Reach out to report a problem, request a feature, or get in touch.

alert.redirect: You must be logged in to use Conversation.

error.description: Check your email and password for typos. If the issue persists, contact the developer.

createError.description: Check if your email and password meet the criteria. If the issue persists, contact the developer.

emailStep.warning: You can only create one account per email.

passwordStep.comicLabel: Comic about choosing a password: click to expand
passwordStep.warning: Keep your password secret. This password should not be the same as any other password you use.

login.ssoInfo: Once you create your account, you can add single sign on providers via account settings.

forgot.description: To reset your password, we'll send you an email with a link letting you log in. After that, we'll change your password.

help.description: To log in, navigate to the login page and enter your email â€“ don't type to @stu.his.ac.jp part as it's already in the input box. To create an account, scroll to the bottom and press "create account" and put in your new username and password. You will need to confirm your email.

message.dm_start: This is the start of this DM. Let's start chatting!
message.chat_start: This is the start of "{{ 0 }}". Be the first one to say something!
message.chat_name_change: {{ 0 }} changed the name of this channel to "{{ 1 }}"
message.easteregg: Someone found an easter egg! ğŸ¤©

general.label: General
general.title: General Settings
general.placeholder: There's nothing here yet. Be on the lookout for new settings!

language.label: Language
language.description: Set the UI language to your preference.

emojiclose.title: Close emoji picker on select
emojiclose.description: Closes the emoji picker automatically after an emoji is selected. If you usually select multiple emoji at a time, disable this option.

sendenter.title: Send on enter
sendenter.description: Send when the enter button is pressed. Press Shift+Enter to insert a newline.

darkmode.title: Dark mode
darkmode.description: Turn out the light to save your eyesight at night.

theme.title: Theme color
theme.description: Customize the interface's Material You primary accent color to your liking.
theme.error: Failed to set the theme color.
